synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: H3TCA (19.0 mg, 0.05 mmol), NPy3 (24.0 mg, 0.05 mmol), Cd(NO3)2·4H2O (77.0 mg, 0.25 mmol)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: methanol solution (48 h) for small molecules exchange, then dried in a vacuum oven (100 °C, 10 h)

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: NPy3 (12.0 mg, 0.025 mmol), CdCl2·2.5H2O (29.0 mg, 0.13 mmol)

synthesis_conditions.preparation_method: Soaking activated Cd-MIX in a methanol solution containing 1a or 1c (10.0 mmol) for 48 h, then washed with fresh methanol and dried

steps.description: Synthesis of [D7]benzyl bromide from [D8]toluene using NBS and benzoyl peroxide in CCl4 at 90 °C
Reaction of [D7]benzyl bromide with pyrrolidine and triethylamine in dichloromethane, followed by NaOH solution addition, extraction, and purification
